0.8.name: wordpress/standard-widget-extensions
0.8.description:
Standard Widget Extensions is extension for WordPress standard themes, Twenty Twelve/Twenty Eleven/Twenty Ten. It's also effective for themes which use widgets in a standard manner.

Current version of the plugin offers following two features. You can individually turn on and off these features.

  1. Accordion Widgets
  2. Sticky Sidebar

Twenty Twelve/Twenty Eleven users can use this plugin out of the box. Other theme users can adjust class names and/or IDs to suit the theme. You can find options for the plugin by selecting a menu 'Settings' - 'Standard WE'. Detailed description for parameters are in the plugin homepage.

From the version 1.0, Standard Widget Extensions supports multiple widget areas in a sidebar. You can specify widget area IDs you want to be collapsible. And also a style tag are generated on the fly for heading icons from
